chapters.title: The Kingdom's Need
chapters.description: King Shantanu falls in love with Satyavati, but her father sets a condition for the marriage.

chapters.title: The Sacrificial Decision
chapters.description: Bhishma renounces his claim to the throne to fulfill his father's wish.

chapters.title: The Oath of Celibacy
chapters.description: Bhishma vows to remain celibate forever, ensuring no descendants to challenge Satyavati's lineage.

chapters.title: Recognition by the Gods
chapters.description: The gods bless Bhishma with the boon of Ichha Mrityu, honoring his sacrifice and commitment.
